CustomField.description: This is from Referral created date to the case Closed Date
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(CreatedDate)), NOT(ISBLANK( Case__r.Case_Closed_Date__c )) ), Case__r.Case_Closed_Date__c - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), NULL )
CustomField.label: Days-Referral Created to Case ClosedDate
